txt.en: 'You have had a long day, friend, and more dangers await! You should take some rest. There is a bedroll just over there you can use. I will wake you if anything happens.'
'That sounds a most curious dream! I never have dreams like that, friend. I would not wish to have such!'
The bedroll is more comfortable than you expected, or perhaps you are more tired than you realized. You close your eyes, and before long you are lost in dreams....
You have had a long day, and a hunter in the Hunter's Lodge thinks you should get some rest.
Use the bedroll in the Hunter's Lodge to get some rest
A hunter has offered you a bedroll in the Hunter's Lodge you can use to rest.
Tell the hunter about your curious dream
You had a most curious dream, and should share it with the hunter in the Hunter's Lodge.
